summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of auth-gated collaboration visibility feature. All 16 test cases passed (100%). The teaser+lock pattern works correctly: first 2 cards visible, rest blurred/locked for non-auth users. Detail page shows teaser info with auth gate. Login redirect works correctly.
passed_tests: ✅ Test 1: Auth CTA banner visible on /collaborations for non-logged-in users
✅ Test 1a: Login and Register buttons present in CTA banner
✅ Test 2.1: Card 1 (first 2) is NOT locked
✅ Test 2.2: Card 2 (first 2) is NOT locked
✅ Test 3: Cards from 3rd position onwards (18 cards) ARE locked with blur overlay
✅ Test 4: Clicking unlocked card redirects to /login with ?redirect=/collaborations/{id}
✅ Test 5: Clicking locked card redirects to /login with ?redirect=/collaborations/{id}
✅ Test 6: Detail page shows locked teaser view (data-testid='collab-detail-locked')
✅ Test 7: Detail auth gate overlay present (data-testid='detail-auth-gate')
✅ Test 8: Budget info visible in teaser view
✅ Test 9: Countdown timer visible in teaser view
✅ Test 10: Register button 'Creează cont gratuit' present in auth gate
✅ Test 11: Login button 'Am deja un cont' present in auth gate
✅ Test 12: Homepage (/) is NOT gated - accessible to everyone
✅ Test 13: Influencer profile (/influencers/testcreator) is NOT gated
✅ Test 14: After login, user redirected to exact collaboration detail page
✅ Test 15: No auth gate visible after login - full details accessible
✅ Test 16: Apply button visible for authenticated user on detail page
✅ Test 17: No auth CTA banner when logged in on /collaborations
✅ Test 18: All 20 cards unlocked for logged-in user (no lock overlays)
critical_code_review_comments: Auth gating implementation is clean with locked prop on CollaborationCard based on isAuthenticated && index >= 2
Redirect param correctly encoded in URL and processed in Auth.js
Detail page teaser shows budget, platform, countdown visible but description blurred - good UX
Lock overlay uses backdrop-blur-[6px] for nice visual effect
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created - used existing test collaborations
context_for_next_testing_agent: Auth-gating feature fully tested and working. Key points: (1) /collaborations shows first 2 cards unlocked, rest with blur+lock overlay for non-auth users (2) All card clicks redirect to /login?redirect=/collaborations/{id} (3) Detail page /collaborations/{id} shows teaser with budget/countdown visible, description blurred, auth CTA overlay (4) After login, redirect param works correctly (5) Homepage and influencer profiles are NOT gated.

collaborations_page.auth_cta_banner: Shows 'Deblochează toate colaborările' with login/register buttons
collaborations_page.first_2_cards_unlocked: Cards at index 0,1 show full content without lock
collaborations_page.cards_3_onwards_locked: Cards at index >= 2 show blur overlay with lock icon
collaborations_page.card_click_redirect: Both locked and unlocked cards redirect to /login with redirect param

collaboration_detail_page.teaser_view: Shows platform badge, title, brand name, budget, applicants, countdown
collaboration_detail_page.blurred_description: Description and deliverables are blurred with blur-[4px]
collaboration_detail_page.auth_gate_overlay: Lock icon with 'Autentifică-te pentru a vedea detaliile'
collaboration_detail_page.auth_buttons: 'Creează cont gratuit' and 'Am deja un cont' with redirect param

login_redirect.post_login_redirect: After successful login, redirects to exact collaboration page

logged_in_users.all_cards_unlocked: All cards show full content without lock overlays
logged_in_users.full_detail_access: Full collaboration details and apply button visible
